data.title: Westminster Schools of Augusta
data.meta_description: Home - A Distinctly Different Educational Experience. Westminster seeks to glorify God by providing an excellent education that equips students to live extraordinary lives for Jesus Christ.
data.text:
Westminster recognizes every student's academic path is unique and so provides support and opportunity at every turn. Our hard-working and talented faculty create a learning environment upheld by pillars of excellence.

Westminster Athletics play an integral part in the lifeblood of our school. Our athletic program unites and promotes Westminster's greatest values.

Westminster Fine Arts provides students with numerous avenues for self-expression. Through visual arts, chorus, band, and drama, we strive to cultivate creativity and inspire excellence.

Seek Jesus, follow His lead. At Westminster we endeavor to place Jesus Christ at the center of everything we do. Through prayer, biblical studies, advisory, worship, and service to others, we are able to grow and develop a solid Christian foundation for our students.
